home.description2: I am passionate about technology and I am looking for an opportunity to venture into the IT world as a Backend Developer and be able to participate in challenging projects.

about.title: About me
about.text1: During the last 10 years, I worked in the manufacturing sector, I worked as a Material Requeriment Planner, Supply Planner, third-party manufacturing planner. I am studying to be a Software Developer, so I would like to be able to perform as such, being able to contribute with the skills that I have already acquired and at the same time I would like to have the possibility of continuing to learn.
about.text2: I am a person with skills to work in a team, take on challenges and face difficulties, work under pressure, characterized by analytical thinking in problem solving and the ability to adapt to change.
